pkgmetadata.longdescription: Log-Concave Distribution Estimation with Interval-Censored Data // We consider the non-parametric maximum likelihood estimation of the underlying distribution function, assuming log- concavity, based on mixed-case interval-censored data. The algorithm implemented is base on Chi Wing Chu, Hok Kan Ling and Chaoyu Yuan (2024, doi:10.48550/arXiv.2411.19878).
